# isZero

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether all of the values of the ray are zero.

## Declaration

```swift
var isZero: Bool { get }
```

## Checking characteristics

- **isFinite**: A Boolean value that indicates whether all of the values of the ray are finite.
- **isNaN**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the ray contains any NaN values.
- **intersects(_:)**: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether a ray intersects a rectangle.
- **intersects(sphereOrigin:sphereRadius:)**: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the ray intersects a specified sphere.
